mapper.sql: createTime, deleteStatus, account, password, name, phone, sex, is_disabled, emp_no, dept_id, position_id, money, is_onjob
id, account, password, name, phone, sex, is_disabled, emp_no, dept_id, position_id, money, is_onjob, createTime
mapper.update: update sys_employee set deleteStatus = 0 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select e.id, e.account, e.password, e.name, e.phone, e.sex, e.is_disabled, e.emp_no, e.dept_id, e.position_id, e.money, e.is_onjob, e.createTime, d.name as deptName, p.name as positionName from sys_employee e left join sys_dept d on d.id = e.dept_id left join sys_position p on p.id = e.position_id where e.deleteStatus = 0 and e.account = #{account} and e.name like concat("%",#{name},"%") and e.phone like concat("%",#{phone},"%") and e.is_onjob = #{is_onjob} and d.name like concat("%",#{deptName},"%") and e.position_id = #{position_id}
